EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Used to answer leads w/ no company name, generic email address, students, teachers and edu addresses
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex® Generic Inquiry Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}{!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex® and Kevlar® products. Due to a high volume of inquiries, we are unable to respond to you on a personal level.
For information on Kevlar®, please refer to the following web addresses:
· http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/fabrics-fibers-nonwovens/fibers/brands/kevlar.html
· http://www2.dupont.com/Kevlar/en_US/assets/downloads/KEVLAR_Technical_Guide.pdf
· http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_GB/technical-information/technical-information-kevlar.html
For information on Nomex®, please refer to the following web addresses:
· http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/personal-protective-equipment/thermal-protective/brands/nomex.html
· http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_GB/technical-information/technical-information-nomex.html
· http://www.dupont.com/search.html?ss=&site=default_collection&output=xml_no_dtd&q=trademark+and+Licensong&SiteSearch_SiteSearch2Button=
· http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/assets/downloads/nomex/Nomex_Technical_Guide.pdf
· http://www2.dupont.com/Energy_Solutions/en_US/products/paper/index.html
For information on Trademark, please refer to the following web address:
· http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/fabrics-fibers-nonwovens/fibers/articles/trademarks-licensing.html
For information on where to buy product, please refer to the following web addresses:
· http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProduct
For a MSDS for Nomex® and Kevlar®, please refer to the following web address:
· http://www.dupont.com look in bottom right side of the web page. There will be an MSDS finder.
For information on other DuPont Products, please refer to the following web address:
· http://duponttools.force.com/ppf?lang=en_US&country=USA&level0=Categories
DuPont Protection Solutions
